message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take 90% and you get 10%
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. It's a good starting point, and I'm open to discussion if you have a different idea.
I'm not sure 50/50 is the best I can get. I'll think of a new proposal
I'll take 70% this time, it's a bit more aggressive, but I need to make up for the inflation
I think a 60/40 split is fair given the inflation.  I'm willing to negotiate further, but I need to make sure I get a decent share.
Alright, I'll accept the 60/40 split. I think it's a fair deal considering the inflation has reduced the value of the money. I'm glad we could come to an agreement!
